Description:
Detects the use of csrutil to view the Configure System Integrity Protection (SIP) status. This technique is used in post-exploit scenarios.


Author: Joseliyo Sanchez, @Joseliyo_Jstnk
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: System Integrity Protection (SIP) Enumeration
Query: sourcetype like 'macos-%' eql select * from _source_ where process_path like '%/csrutil' and command like '%status%'
